name: Not Making It
description:
Quick time events are stupid right!? Anyways ... make this coder happy by getting him to his computer.

# Features #

  • Pixels
  • Game references
  • Cheezy music loop
  • Camera shake
  • Quick time events

# Controls #

  • Any key to navigate menu
  • L,D,3,1 for movement

# Software #

  • Unity3D
  • Photoshop
  • Logic Pro
  • Cfxr

(A game made for Ludum Dare #LD31)
